## ChunkEventPayloads."CHUNK.SET\_BLOCK" property

Emitted when a block is set in a chunk.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[ChunkEvent.SET_BLOCK]: {
        chunk: Chunk;
        globalCoordinate: Vector3Like;
        localCoordinate: Vector3Like;
        blockTypeId: number;
    };
```
